column5: Does anyone know of a website where I can find fishing regulations for the various zones in the Province of Ontario? Thanks in advance for any assistance.
You'll find a downloadable version of a map and all of the reg's. on the following page: http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/MNR/pubs/pubmenu.html.Enjoy
Thanks, "Eyeshole". Your suggestion provided all the information I could ask for. Thanks again.
